issue.title: Moved to Docker Swarm and docker refuses to bind now, any ideas ?
issue.body:

      "-zmqpubrawblock=tcp://0.0.0.0:28889",

Any help really appreciated

I am kind of lost, it must be something network related.

Anybody managed to get it running swarm ?

Oh, also work mentioning, right now - i am running 1 replica.

Does this library have an issue ?

It appears it does not like "bitcoind", which is the name of my service and able to ping it.

events.body:
> - it works on a standard docker without swarm

This sounds like a configuration/networking issue with Docker swarm, and not a problem with Bitcoin Core. If anything I'd suggest (re)-reading https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/JSON-RPC-interface.md, which does mention Docker.
